Reference

Data

Data sets included in package

sendis

A dataset of criticality benchmarks calculations

exps

A dataset of exps ...

sens

A dataset containing sensitivity data etc ...

Build

Build a complete site or its individual section components.

build_derived_calcs()

Computes and adds columns :

build_splitcolumns()

Returns a data frame with extra columns : LIB, VER, CASETYPE, FISS, FORM, SPEC

import_userdata()

Import csv data file from user and returns a data frame columns CASETYPE, FISS, FORM, SPEC are reconstructed from column FULLID

Test

check_format_errors()

Checks that csv data is in expected format

Plots

Functions to generate frequent plots

plot_cumulchi()

plot cumulative Chi-square function

plot_ealf()

Plot C over E vs EALF.

plot_hc()

Plot hierarchical clustering

plot_scree()

plot scree plot for clustering analysis

Others

rename_table_header()

Restyle header for sendis-report.

return_chitable()

Returns dataframe with total chi-square values

return_common_suite()

Returns dataframe df with only common cases specified by inst

return_discrepant()

Return a dataframe of common calculated benchmarks between two institutions and filter them according to their difference.
